name: Find The Key
description:
The grass blocks the passage, you have to find the key to open the door.


it is a linear horror themed adventure,


you don't really have to look for a key, between skeletons and giant aliens the gameplay is basically walking and running, strange things happen along the way (lol)


.. there is a secret ending, it lasts about 50 minutes.


it's my first game, i developed it myself using unreal engine 5 with a gtx 1060 6gb and 16gb ram, but you can decrease the graphics settings if needed.
I recommend using the controller for the vibration functions.
